Library Must Read View of Must read done Book / Video 1 Scrum by Jeff Sutherland 2 What you do is who you are by Ben Horowitz 3 The hard thing about hard things by Ben Horowitz 4 ⁠Measure What Matters: ⁠ by John Doerr ⁠ and Larry Page 5 Principles by Ray Dalio 6 ⁠Who? ⁠ by Geoff Smart ⁠ ⁠ 7 No Rules Rule of Netflix 8 ​ New row ⁠ New companies generally should not exist ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ /video ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ New companies generally should not exist ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ Meet Jack Ma ⁠ Loading… ⁠ ⁠ ⁠ What and why we do ⁠ ⁠ Capital Markets Manage the Planet Emergence of Capital Markets is like the emergence of a neural system communicating with cells via electric signals instead of slow chains of chemical reactions. ⁠ ⁠ History of Power and Money Blockchain works where political power fails. ⁠ ⁠ Goal of Life Life maximises its viability which is capitalization ⁠ 29 Privacy Preference Center When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Cookie Notice Allow All Manage Consent Preferences Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Active These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. Analytics and Customization Cookies Analytics and Customization Cookies Allow cookies on the Coda website that help us analyze traffic and improve your experience. Advertising (Targeting) Cookies Advertising (Targeting) Cookies Allow the collection of data and use of cookies on the Coda website to personalize ads on partner websites. Third-party Publisher Analytics Cookies Third-party Publisher Analytics Cookies Allow third-party publisher cookies on their published docs used to track publisher document activity.
